oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A nonzero-sum stochastic differential game in the orthant
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GHOSH, MK
KUMAR, KS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: existence
strategies
equilibrium
information
reflecting diffusions
discounted and average payoff
nash equilibrium
stationary strategies
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study a nonzero-sum stochastic differential game where the state is a controlled reflecting diffusion in the nonnegative orthant. Under certain conditions, we establish the existence of Nash equilibria in stationary strategies for both discounted and average payoff criteria. (c) 2004
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MATHEMATICAL ANALYSIS AND APPLICATIONS, 305(1), 158-174
